name: Tacticus
description:
Tacticus is a mutliplayer strategy game featuring turn based combat similar to Stratego and Risk.

The UI and rules are deceptively simple, the strategy is challenging.

The goal of the game is to capture your opponent's flag while protecting your own.
Each unit can move once per turn.
There are three different types of units, each with a unique ability.
Injured units can be combined to make one of them full strength.

My goal for this game is to create a quality game that you will want to keep playing over and over again for a long time, anywhere you choose. You will be able to buy it once and play anywhere. Purchasing from Itch gives you a premium account for Android and Windows Store as well.
